author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
I finally plugged in my Elgato Stream Deck so now it's time to show you how to configure under Linux because it certainly doesn't have official support from Elgato but there are a lot of 3rd party community tools.

==========Support The Channel==========
► Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon
► Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal
► Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay
► Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa

==========Resources==========
StreamDeck UI: https://github.com/streamdeck-linux-gui/streamdeck-linux-gui
Boatswain: https://gitlab.gnome.org/World/boatswain
OpenDeck: https://github.com/nekename/OpenDeck
StreamController: https://github.com/StreamController/StreamController
Python StreamDeck: https://github.com/abcminiuser/python-elgato-str
title: Elgato Stream Deck Works Amazingly On Linux
